author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the mango in a bowl and dust heavily with icing sugar.  Add the lime juice and zest to the bowl and mix. Set aside and allow to marinate for up to ten minutes.  Meanwhile, whip the cream in a clean bowl to thicken. Transfer the mango to a serving dish and spoon the whipped cream on top to serve
ingredients: ½ mango, peeled and sliced,  icing sugar, to dust,  ½ lime, juiced and zested,  double cream, to serve
